name: Drupal 7.x latest core update files
tagline: Latest Drupal 7 stable version update only files.
body:
Latest Drupal 7 stable version update only files. Use this file to update your Drupal 7 site.

### Files and Folders removed:

* /sites folder

* all .txt files on root

* .htaccess on root

### How to use it

* Follow the [Update Drupal core](https://drupal.org/node/1494290) instructions.

* This tarball is referred to No 3 step: _Extract the [tar ball or zip] Drupal package_.

### Core packages

* Zip: https://github.com/tplcom/drupal7-latest-core/archive/master.zip
* Tar: https://github.com/tplcom/drupal7-latest-core/archive/master.tar.gz
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
